Summary: 6 lights 3 large white 3 small red hexagon shape
divs: Sighting Detailsi was outside smoking. listening to music on mp3 player . saw what looked like a star getting bigger then it turned on its side and flew in a way plane s and helicopter can not . when above me mp3 player stopped working( no sound) went over the out line of the moon and got and out line and then proceeded to get smaller from the outside rapidly giving the impression that it went straight up in speeds unknown . helicopters where in area minutes latter about 3 min approx
